div.div: Hatch delay for great tits and blue tits at Brampton Wood Nature Reserve in relation to mean daily temperature maximum (T max) and rainfall (the best predictor weather variables) during the week prior to clutch completion, the week of clutch completion, and the week after clutch completion.
div.p: Symbols represent individual nests during 2003-2011 (black) and 2012 only (red).
